text: She's never shied away from talking about her famous family. And Kim Kardashian admitted that her two children have a bit of a complicated relationship as North'doesn't share'with her little brother Saint. The 37 - year - old reality television star revealed to Ellen DeGeneres that her four - year - old daughter'hardly talks'to her two - year - old brother, but is starting to show a little more love after years of rivalry.
